summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingBYOMA Liptide pH Lip Oil is a glossy, lightweight lip oil with a soft, flushed tint that adapt to your lips' natural pH‚Äì cushioning and conditioning without stickiness. Peptide-rich Liptide Complex + hydrating Avocado + Tamanu Oils instantly nourish, plump and soften.
details: DetailsBenefitspH adjusting formula gives lips a tailored tint and soft, flushed finishLiptide Complex powered by peptides, ceramides + lipids plumps + hydratesInstantly replenishes moisture levels and increases natural supplenessThe glow of a gloss without the stickinessVegan & cruelty freeFeaturesAdaptive technology works with your natural pH for a tinted finishBYOMA's Liptide Complex- a lip-compatible blend of actives- strengthens the skin barrier + minimizes water loss for full, healthy lipsHydrating, skin-loving ingredients deliver instant hydrationGlossy-oil texture feels weightless and non-stickyKey IngredientsLiptide Complex works to strengthen the skin barrier for fuller, healthier lipsAvocado Oil nourishes, restores and conditions skinTamanu Oil helps minimize water loss and hydrate skin for up to 24hrsItem 2621901How To UseSmooth applicator onto lips AM + PM as needed.IngredientsPolyisobutene, Diisostearyl Malate, Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Phytosteryl Isostearyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Bixa Orellana Seed Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Red 27 (CI 45410), Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Glycerin, Tocopherol, Calophyllum Inophyllum Seed Oil, Fragrance, Sphingolipids, Ceramide NP.
how_to_use: Smooth applicator onto lips AM + PM as needed.

reviews.headline: Has the potential to be great
reviews.comments: I'm kinda sad because I was SOOOO excited to get this product. When I got it I thought it was so pretty and I was in loveee...until I left it sideways on my nightstand and it leaked EVERYWHERE. also I use it when I have dry lips, and dead skin flakes just get stuck and go back into the tube. It's just a sticky mess all over and the consistency is sometimes amazing and slay and chefs kiss.. other times it's gross and flakey. It also kinda made my lips dryer. Look, Byoma, I know you want to make your products big and clunky and cute for a younger audience, but PLEASE work on your packaging so I can actually use all of the product. I totally recommend this product if you don't have a problem with leakage and stickiness, But I'll be finishing the rest of mine and probably not repurchasing until the packaging and formula get an upgrade.

reviews.headline: Awesome
reviews.comments: This is awesome I will buy again againü§©üòçüíó.It is so cute and it is worth the price. I recommend it.

reviews.headline: Conflicted
reviews.comments: I love the consistency of this product and the applicator so much, but for some reason I started breaking out around my lips after using this. I'm so disappointed.

reviews.headline: Leaks all over.
reviews.comments: Leaks leaks.  This a leak machine. Use w ziploc bag if you gonna put in ur purse

reviews.headline: Bottle leaks
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this product but the container itself leaks if it is not always in an upright position. I even exchanged it and the same thing happened with the second bottle

reviews.headline: Better than others
reviews.comments: This lip oil is not sticky and makes my lips pop even though there is no actual tint. Tried many other lip oils but this one is one I'll buy again.

reviews.headline: Leaks constantly
reviews.comments: Absolutely obsessed with the formula, one of my favorite lip oils I have ever tried, but it leaks everywhere! It's ruined two purses of mine, and stained pockets. If you accidentally let it kay horizontal, 1/2 the bottle will empty on your nightstand

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: Product leaks

reviews.headline: Great product. Terrible packaging.
reviews.comments: I love the product, but the packaging is bothersome. Product leaks out of container always. Really an inconvenience having to always clean up your makeup bag when deciding to wear product.

reviews.headline: Gorgeous, but it ALWAYS. LEAKS.
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this lip oil and I've hardly had it for any time, but it leaks everywhere. My purse and everything inside it is ruined. The lop oil is beautiful and feels amazing but the packaging needs an update!

reviews.headline: Mediocre
reviews.comments:
I picked this up the other day and honestly I am not impressed. Lets start with the whole pH thing‚Äîthats a marketing gimmick if I have ever seen one. You are not reinventing the lip oil wheel here.

As for the formula, its fine. Light texture, smells nice enough, but I did not notice any major hydration or softness beyond the first 10 to 15 minutes. After that my lips were like, did we even put anything on

But the real offender here is the packaging. Why do I need upper body strength and a prayer to get the wand out Every time I open it I feel like I need protective goggles in case the thing snaps back at me. It is giving beauty product meets resistance band.

If the packaging gets fixed and the formula steps up its hydration game maybe I would bump this to a 3.5 star. For now it is a cute idea but not worth the effort literally.

reviews.headline: Favorite but packaging is an issue
reviews.comments: This lipgloss is very good. Love the color. Smells amazing kind of like a cherry slushee. Problem is i bought this a Ulta and when i opened it the applicator broke and fell off into the lipgloss. Luckily the Ulta employees let me switch it out for a new one. Another problem is if you leave it laying down it leaks out i always have to keep it straight up not helpful if you want it in a bag. But definitely worth the price

reviews.headline: Lip oil leaks out of the container !
reviews.comments: Lip oil leaks out of the container ! very messy

reviews.headline: Messy
reviews.comments: This was absolutely awful! Feels like the texture of old canola oil. Very messy and will leak out very easily! Doesn't feel good on the lips at all. Overall, a sticky slightly greasy mess.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: It so good every time i wear it my friends ask were i got it from i say, it's Byoma girl.

reviews.headline: I want to buy it again but it leaks everywhere
reviews.comments: This product is amazing EXCEPT for the packaging. It leaks everywhere. I bought a few of them to try and see if I had a faulty one but ALL of them leaked. Please BYOMA change your packaging. Everyone is having this problem. You will lose customers

reviews.headline: Great gloss but hate the packaging
reviews.comments: I was so intrigued by the square packaging and the ingredients and I do think the gloss feels nice, but the packaging is really annoying, I can only leave it standing up on my vanity because if it's sideways it leaks!

reviews.headline: It's nice
reviews.comments: I like the color and how it's almost like a lip stain for me, but it unfortunately dried my lips out. It could've just been a me thing though ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

reviews.headline: Byoma lip oil
reviews.comments: This is ok. Feels nice on the lips. Doesn't really change colors.

reviews.headline: Packaging needs improvement, leaks everywhere
reviews.comments:
Love the lip oil itself. Smells great, feels nice on the lips and leaves a natural tint. 
Knocking off 2 stars as it leaked all over my bag and left permanent stains that won't wash out. I'd be hesitant to repurchase until the packaging is fixed

media.headline: Thick lip oil that smells like mixed berries
Thick lip oil that smells like mixed berries
Non-sticky lip oil that hydrates and lasts!
media.caption: new lip oil in packaging

faceoff_positive.comments:
I would never have heard of this lip oil if it hadn't been for an app I use that reviews the ingredients of foods & products. My prior lip gloss was not considered great and this was one of the recommended alternatives. I'm very glad I tried it.

Positives
The tint on my lips is a light pink that I absolutely love. It is a very glossy look which is different from the more matte looks I prefer, but I really love how natural the color looks. The formula is very moisturizing and doesn't require constant re-application (it won't stay on if you eat though). 

Negatives
The downsides are that the product does leak (it got all over my white purse and my sink) and it's close to impossible to clean. The other downside is that it is a bit sticky on the lips. I have long hair that often gets stuck to my lips when I've recently applied it. 

Overall, the positives outweigh the negatives. I still like this product and am buying my second bottle. I'm just not going to carry it in my purse again.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great product

faceoff_negative.comments: I found this product at my local Ulta and I was so excited to use it purchased it and I used it for the first time I love the way that it felt, and I loved how long it stayed on my lips, and I especially loved how hydrating the avocado oil is to my lips but unfortunately it leaked all over my purse and even when I sat it upright, it continued to leak and I wasn't exactly sure what the reasoning was behind it, but it seems as though I'm not the only one with that problem I have yet to buy a second one because half the product if not all of it Out of the tube and so unfortunately it ended up being a waste of money because I was not able to use it the way that it's supposed to be. I really wanted to love the lip oil and I do I just think the packaging should be in a different kind. Because I love byoma products  and I love the company and I especially love what they stand for.
faceoff_negative.headline: PH LIP OIL
